DOC.criteria: Active primary recurrent subfoveal choroidal neovascularization lesion due AMD Subjects either gender age 50 year old Visual acuity well 0.05 decimal ( 20/400 Snellen ) Signed informed consent form Prior treatment neovascular AMD study eye , example , PDT antiVEGF therapy Patients whose lesion site evaluate FA examination 12DA subject eye Patients treatment triamcinolone intravitreal injection within 6 month subject eye Patients history intraocular surgical operation ( include cataract ) within 3 month subject eye Patients serious allergic history fluorescein , indocyanine green , iodophors The pregnant lactating woman
